name: ezyCarDealer
tag_list: car-dealer, web-design, car-dealer-website, car-dealer-website-design, car-dealer-cms, content-management-system, stivasoft, stivasoft-review
overview: EzyCarDealer is an online software application that powers your website and is delivered as a service with a complete suite of powerful tools for managing car dealer websites. EzyCarDealer delivers fully-functional, attractive, and cost-effective auto dealer websites with built-in car classifieds module. EzyCarDealer allows you to change content and manage your entire car inventory. It outperforms most software systems because it exclusively covers the specific industry requirements upheld by car dealerships. Anyone can use the system for FREE which will not add restrictions to any of the features except the number of listings. A Premium account will cost a little bit over a dollar per day but provides your website with hosting, domain name registration and search engine optimization, all-inclusive. -CONTENT MANAGEMENT: easy to use content management system with а powerful auto classifieds module. You can manage your car dealer website content through the ezyCarDealer system easy as a piece-of-cake. -CAR MANAGEMENT: add cars for sale or rent, manage featured car ads, put a SOLD mark and window sticker. Unlimited car classifieds with a Premium Account. -A NUMBER OF CAR DEALER TEMPLATES: choose between 3 and 15 web templates for your car dealer website. Designed by Stivasoft, all car dealer templates are user-friendly, intuitive and nice and clean design. -MONETIZE YOUR BUSINESS: manage banners and classified ads. Add your Paypal account and charge users for adding auto classified ads to your website. Also you can manage banners and featured car listing. -OTHER useful features: schedule test drive, loan calculator, car comparison table, image watermark , send to a friend feature – all these features are available with both the Free and the Premium account with ezyCarDealer. EzyCarDealer is service of StivaSoft Ltd., a European application development company with over nine years of experience creating comprehensive business solutions. For more information about Stivasoft visit http://www.ezycardealer.com/services.php
